text.section: Unless instructions described in subsection (1) of this section are included in a negotiable bill of lading, a person to which the bill is duly negotiated may hold the bailee according to the original terms.

law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 19, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 7-303, effective July 1, 1960.
